Cookie Policy

Last Updated: December 2024

What Are Cookies

Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit websites. They help websites remember your preferences and improve your browsing experience.

How We Use Cookies

CostFlowAI uses cookies for the following purposes:

Cookie Type Purpose Duration
Essential Required for website functionality Session
Analytics Understanding website usage (Google Analytics 4) Up to 2 years
Preferences Remembering your calculator settings 30 days

Third-Party Cookies

We may use Google Analytics 4 to understand how visitors use our website. Google may set cookies for this purpose. For more information, see Google's Privacy Policy.

Managing Cookies

You can control cookies through your browser settings:

  • Chrome: Settings > Privacy and Security > Cookies and other site data
  • Firefox: Settings > Privacy & Security > Cookies and Site Data
  • Safari: Preferences > Privacy > Cookies and website data
  • Edge: Settings > Cookies and site permissions

Cookie Consent

By continuing to use our website, you consent to our use of cookies as described in this policy. You can withdraw consent at any time by adjusting your browser settings.

Impact of Disabling Cookies

Disabling cookies may affect website functionality:

  • Your calculator preferences may not be saved
  • We cannot analyze website usage to improve our tools
  • Some features may not work properly

Updates to This Policy

We may update this cookie policy from time to time. Check this page periodically for changes.

Contact Us

For questions about our cookie policy, contact us at: privacy@costflowai.com
